content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":127231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはっはっ、大きいことはいいことだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha ha ha, bigger is better."},{"lineNumber":127232,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山食べて大きくなるがいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eat plenty and grow bigger.\""},{"lineNumber":127233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほれ、リセット・カラー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here you go, Reset Color."},{"lineNumber":127234,"originalJapaneseLine":"　キャベツをくれてやれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Give her some cabbage,"},{"lineNumber":127235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　牙に手を引っかけぬように気をつけろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be careful not to get your hand caught on her fangs.\""},{"lineNumber":127236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クロちゃん、はいどうぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuro-chan, here you go—\""},{"lineNumber":127237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あむ、んむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nom, nom...\""},{"lineNumber":127238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっしゃぐっしゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Crunch crunch...\""},{"lineNumber":127239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くあー！　美味ぇー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuaa! Delicious!"},{"lineNumber":127240,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱキャベツはいいなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Cabbage really is the best!\""},{"lineNumber":127241,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お芋さんもたべる？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you want some sweet potato too?"},{"lineNumber":127242,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カボチャさんもあるよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's pumpkin as well, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":127243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バナナもあるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's also banana.\""},{"lineNumber":127244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、全部好きだけどよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I like them all, but..."},{"lineNumber":127245,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのチョイスに疑問が残るっつーか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I do question that choice, somehow...\""},{"lineNumber":127246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ボール遊びする！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, do you want to play with the ball!?\""},{"lineNumber":127247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから犬扱いすんなっつってんだろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I said, don’t treat me like a dog!\""},{"lineNumber":127248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーー！　大っきい口ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa! Such a big mouth!\""},{"lineNumber":127249,"originalJapaneseLine":"「牙、牙、牙牙牙♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fangs, fangs, fang, fang, fang ♪\""},{"lineNumber":127250,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットが嬉しそうに黒部の牙をつんつん触れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset happily poked Kurobe’s fangs."},{"lineNumber":127251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":127252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance..."},{"lineNumber":127253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の娘、ちぃーとお転婆が過ぎるぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your daughter is a little too much of a tomboy...\""},{"lineNumber":127254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな、お前の言う通りだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, you’re right about that...\""},{"lineNumber":127255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さぁて、そろそろ魔法薬をやるとしよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, it’s about time to give the magic potion.\""},{"lineNumber":127256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、早くしてくれや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, hurry up with it.\""},{"lineNumber":127257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセット・カラー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reset Color,"},{"lineNumber":127258,"originalJapaneseLine":"　首筋の後ろにこれをさせ」","translatedEnglishLine":"put this on the back of her neck.\""},{"lineNumber":127259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay.\""},{"lineNumber":127260,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルの周りの骸骨達が","translatedEnglishLine":"The skeletons around Miracle"},{"lineNumber":127261,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットを黒部の頭上まで軽々と持ち上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"easily lifted Reset above Kurobe’s head."},{"lineNumber":127262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よい……しょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There... done.\""},{"lineNumber":127263,"originalJapaneseLine":"お弁当の中に入っている醤油差しのような容器から","translatedEnglishLine":"From a container resembling a soy sauce bottle inside the lunch box,"},{"lineNumber":127264,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぽたりと一滴だけ薬が黒部の首に落ちる。","translatedEnglishLine":"a single drop of potion fell onto Kurobe’s neck."},{"lineNumber":127265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くぅーーーっ、効くーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuuuu— it’s working—!\""},{"lineNumber":127266,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身をぶるっとさせて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Shaking his whole body,"},{"lineNumber":127267,"originalJapaneseLine":"黒部はどこか嬉しそうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe looked somewhat happy."},{"lineNumber":127268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、これは本当に効果あるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, does this really work?\""},{"lineNumber":127269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ある。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It does."},{"lineNumber":127270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界の何が信じられなくなっても、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you lose faith in everything in the world,"},{"lineNumber":127271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　余だけは信じろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"believe in me alone.\""},{"lineNumber":127272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ、最近の薬はすごいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, recent potions are amazing...\""},{"lineNumber":127273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、なんなんだ、それは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what exactly is that?\""},{"lineNumber":127274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":127275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……秘密」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...A secret.\""},{"lineNumber":127276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目だ、主命令だ、言え」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way, it’s a direct order from the lord, tell me.\""},{"lineNumber":127277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぐっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...!\""},{"lineNumber":127278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……取りだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It’s for fleas.\""},{"lineNumber":127279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は？　なんだって？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":127280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ノミ取りの薬だよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s a flea repellent potion!"},{"lineNumber":127281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これで満足か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you satisfied now!?\""},{"lineNumber":127282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……わんわん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Woof woof.\""},{"lineNumber":127283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ、不愉快だ！　帰る！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, that’s disgusting! I’m leaving!\""},{"lineNumber":127284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん、クロちゃん、クロちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aahn, Kuro-chan, Kuro-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":127285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クロちゃんって呼ぶな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t call me Kuro-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":127286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつ、初代妖怪王なのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though he was the first Yokai King,"},{"lineNumber":127287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すっかり犬扱いだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he’s completely treated like a dog...\""},{"lineNumber":127288,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは、昔々のお話――","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a story from long, long ago—"},{"lineNumber":127289,"originalJapaneseLine":"とあるところに、オロチのキバより","translatedEnglishLine":"In a certain place, from the fangs of Orochi,"},{"lineNumber":127290,"originalJapaneseLine":"妖怪化した黒部という巨大な妖怪がおったそうな。","translatedEnglishLine":"there was a huge yokai named Kurobe who had transformed into a yokai."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっはっ、大きいことはいいことだ。
沢山食べて大きくなるがいい」
キャベツをくれてやれ、
牙に手を引っかけぬように気をつけろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be careful not to get your hand caught on her fangs."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱキャベツはいいなー！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you want some sweet potato too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カボチャさんもあるよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's pumpkin as well, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのチョイスに疑問が残るっつーか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I do question that choice, somehow..."
"Ah, do you want to play with the ball!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから犬扱いすんなっつってんだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I said, don’t treat me like a dog!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーー！　大っきい口ー！」
リセットが嬉しそうに黒部の牙をつんつん触れる。
お前の娘、ちぃーとお転婆が過ぎるぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your daughter is a little too much of a tomboy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、お前の言う通りだ……」
「さぁて、そろそろ魔法薬をやるとしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, it’s about time to give the magic potion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首筋の後ろにこれをさせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: put this on the back of her neck."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルの周りの骸骨達が
リセットを黒部の頭上まで軽々と持ち上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: easily lifted Reset above Kurobe’s head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お弁当の中に入っている醤油差しのような容器から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a container resembling a soy sauce bottle inside the lunch box,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽたりと一滴だけ薬が黒部の首に落ちる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a single drop of potion fell onto Kurobe’s neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くぅーーーっ、効くーーーーっ！」
全身をぶるっとさせて、
黒部はどこか嬉しそうだった。
「で、これは本当に効果あるのか？」
世界の何が信じられなくなっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you lose faith in everything in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ、最近の薬はすごいな……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, it’s a direct order from the lord, tell me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん、クロちゃん、クロちゃん」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though he was the first Yokai King,
he’s completely treated like a dog..."
This is a story from long, long ago—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とあるところに、オロチのキバより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a certain place, from the fangs of Orochi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪化した黒部という巨大な妖怪がおったそうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a huge yokai named Kurobe who had transformed into a yokai.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

沢山食べて大きくなるがいい」
キャベツをくれてやれ、
牙に手を引っかけぬように気をつけろ」
